Service.title: Service
Service.description: Represents a service offered by Daki Techs.

image.description: URL of the image representing the service.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project completed or ongoing by Daki Techs.

image.description: URL of the image showcasing the project.

technologiesUsed.description: List of technologies used in the project.

BlogPost.title: BlogPost
BlogPost.description: Represents a blog post on the Daki Techs website.

id.description: Unique identifier for the blog post.

excerpt.description: Short excerpt or summary of the blog post.

content.description: Full content of the blog post.

date.description: Date the blog post was published.

category.description: Category of the blog post (e.g., Tech Trends, Web Development).

Career.title: Career
Career.description: Represents a job posting at Daki Techs.

id.description: Unique identifier for the career/job posting.

description.description: Detailed description of the job responsibilities and requirements.

requirements.description: Specific skills and qualifications required for the job.

location.description: Location of the job (e.g., city, country).

id.description: Unique identifier for the FAQ entry.

category.description: Category of the FAQ (e.g., General, Services).

TeamMember.title: TeamMember
TeamMember.description: Represents a team member at Daki Techs.

id.description: Unique identifier for the team member.

name.description: Full name of the team member.

role.description: Job title or role of the team member.

bio.description: Short biography of the team member.

image.description: URL of the image of the team member.

AcademyCourse.title: AcademyCourse
AcademyCourse.description: Represents a course offered by Daki Academy.

id.description: Unique identifier for the academy course.

description.description: Detailed description of the course content and objectives.

modules.description: List of modules covered in the course.

AcademyBatch.title: AcademyBatch
AcademyBatch.description: Represents a batch of an academy course.

id.description: Unique identifier for the academy batch.

schedule.description: Schedule of the batch (e.g., days and times).

id.description: Unique identifier for the privacy policy.

content.description: The actual content of the privacy policy.

TermsOfService.title: TermsOfService
TermsOfService.description: Represents the terms of service content.

id.description: Unique identifier for the terms of service.

content.description: The actual content of the terms of service.

NextBatch.title: NextBatch
NextBatch.description: Information about the next upcoming batch.

CurrentBatch.title: CurrentBatch
CurrentBatch.description: Information about the currently running batch.

startDate.description: The start date of the batch.

/services/{serviceId}.description: Stores service information. Only accessible to admins.

/projects/{projectId}.description: Stores project information. Only accessible to admins.

/blogPosts/{blogPostId}.description: Stores blog post information. Only accessible to admins.

/careers/{careerId}.description: Stores career/job posting information. Only accessible to admins.

/faqs/{faqId}.description: Stores FAQ entries. Only accessible to admins.

/teamMembers/{teamMemberId}.description: Stores team member information. Only accessible to admins.

/academyCourses/{academyCourseId}.description: Stores academy course information. Only accessible to admins.

/academyCourses/{academyCourseId}/batche.description: Stores academy batch information.  'academyCourseId' is denormalized for simpler querying and enforces hierarchical ownership. Only accessible to admins.

/privacyPolicy/{privacyPolicyId}.description: Stores privacy policy content. Only accessible to admins.

/termsOfService/{termsOfServiceId}.description: Stores terms of service content. Only accessible to admins.

/announcements/nextBatch.description: A single document storing the status of the next batch registration.

/announcements/currentBatch.description: A single document storing the start date of the current batch.
